item.title: An Annoying MySQL Replication Error Code: 1045
item.description: ![MySQL](“https://cdn.chrisshort.net/logo-mysql-170x115.png") (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); I was fixing MySQL replication on a slave this past week. Everything seemed to be ready to go after bringing data over from the master manually. I went to connect the slave to the master and nothing happened. Whaaaaaa? Last_IO_Errno: 1045 Last_IO_Error: error connecting to master 'repl@blah.local:3306' - retry-time: 60 retries: 86400 Let me look up MySQL error code 1045:
